Modele

Class Partie

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Observable
      • Modele.Partie

  • public class Partie
extends Observable
    The core of the game, the Partie class inherits Observable and is where the game plays on console and a major part of it is used for the GUI interaction. The partie can chose the player that begins the round, give the turn to the next player, supervise how a round of cards go and does this for both virtual and physical players.
    Author:
    dinh_,tran_
    See Also:
    Observable

      • lancerRound

        public void lancerRound()
        This method simulates what a player's round is like for both virtual and physical players. First, they must chose a player to take an offer from, then choose a card from their offer to take.
